GR14caitcanu:0: There are two numbering systems for this text. The material is
GR14caitcanu:1: sometimes organized into twelve themes and numbered accordingly.
GR14caitcanu:2: Those numbers are given in brackets. The editions used were:
GR14caitcanu:6: Texts without an alternative number are not found in either one of the editions. No attempt has been made to provide alternative readings.
GR14caitcanu:11: sarvair āmnāya-cūḍāmaṇibhir api na saṃlakṣyate yat svarūpaṃ śrīśa-brahmādy-agamyā sumadhura-padavī kāpi yasyāsti ramyā |
GR14caitcanu:12: yenākasymāj jagac-chrī-hari-rasa-madirā-mattam etad vyadhāyi śrīmac-caitanya-candraḥ sa kim u mama girāṃ gocaraś cetaso vā ||2|| (137)
GR14caitcanu:13: dharme niṣṭhāṃ dadhad anupamāṃ viṣṇu-bhaktiṃ gariṣṭhāṃ saṃbibhrāṇo dadhad ahaha hṛt-tiṣṭhatīvāśma-sāram
GR14caitcanu:14: nīco goghrād api jagad aho plāvayaty aśru-pūraiḥ
GR14caitcanu:15: ko vā jānāty ahaha gahanaṃ heama-gaurāṅga-raṅgam ||3|| (127)
GR14caitcanu:16: dharmāspṛṣṭaḥ satata-paramāviṣṭa evātyadharme dṛṣṭiṃ prāpto na hi khalu satāṃ sṛṣṭiṣu kvāpi no san |
GR14caitcanu:18: ty uccair gāyaty atha viluṭhati staumi taṃ kañcid īśam ||4|| (2)
GR14caitcanu:20: parītānāṃ pāpair api purubhir eṣāṃ tanu-bhṛtām |
GR14caitcanu:21: aho vajra-prāyaṃ hṛd api navanītāyitam abhūn nṝṇāṃ yasmin loke'vatarati sa gauro mama gatiḥ na yogo na dhyānaṃ na ca japa-tapas-tyāga-niyamā
GR14caitcanu:22: na vedā nācāraḥ kva nu bata niṣiddhādy-uparatiḥ |
GR14caitcanu:24: pumarthānāṃ mauliṃ param iha mudā luṇṭhati janaḥ ||6|| (111)
GR14caitcanu:25: yan nāptaṃ karma-niṣṭhair na ca samadhigataṃ yat tapo-dhyāna-yogai-
GR14caitcanu:26: rvairāgyais tyāga-tattva-stutibhir api na yat tarkitaṃ cāpi kaiścit |
GR14caitcanu:27: govinda-prema-bhājām api na ca kalitaṃ yad-rahasyaṃ svayaṃ tan-
GR14caitcanu:28: nāmnaiva prādurāsīd avatarati pare yatra taṃ naumi gauram ||7|| (3)
GR14caitcanu:30: kriyāsaktān dhig dhig vikaḍa-tapaso dhik ca yaminaḥ |
GR14caitcanu:32: na keṣāṃcil leśo'py ahaha milito gaura-madhunaḥ ||8|| (32)
GR14caitcanu:35: aśru-snāta-mukhaḥ svam eva hi jagannāthaṃ didṛkṣur gatā-
GR14caitcanu:36: yātair gaura-tanur vilocana-mudaṃ tanvan hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||9|| (16)
GR14caitcanu:37: pāṣāṇaḥ pariṣocito'mṛta-rasair naivāṅkuraḥ sambhavet lāṅgūlaṃ saramāpater vivṛṇataḥ syād asya naivārjavam |
GR14caitcanu:38: hastāv unnayatā budhāḥ katham aho dhāryaṃ vidhor maṇḍalaṃ sarvaṃ sādhanam astu gaura-karuṇābhāve na bhāvotsavaḥ ||10|| (36)
GR14caitcanu:42: gauro devaḥ sa jīyān praṇaya-rasa-pade darśitāś carya-koṭiḥ ||11|| (101)
GR14caitcanu:43: premā nāmādbhutārthaḥ śravaṇa-patha-gataḥ kasya nāmnāṃ mahimnaḥ
GR14caitcanu:60: ekībhūtaṃ vapur avatu vo rādhayā mādhavasya ||16|| (13)
GR14caitcanu:64: āścaryaṃ lavaṇoda-rodhasi paraṃ brahma svayaṃ nṛtyati ||17|| (131)
GR14caitcanu:70: suprakāśita-ratnaughe yo dīno dīna eva saḥ ||19|| (34)
GR14caitcanu:71: śravaṇa-manana-saṅkīrtyādi-bhaktyā murārer yadi parama-pumarthaṃ sādhayet ko'pi bhadram |
GR14caitcanu:73: kim api rasa-rahasyaṃ dhāma gauraṃ namasyam ||20|| (58)
GR14caitcanu:74: niṣṭhāṃ prāptā vyavahṛti-tatir laukikī vaidikī yā
GR14caitcanu:77: gauraś cauraḥ sakalam aharat ko'pi me tīvra-vīryaḥ ||21|| (60)
GR14caitcanu:82: strī-putrādi-kathāṃ jahur viṣayiṇaḥ śāstra-pravādaṃ budhā yogīndrā vijahur marun-niyama-ja-kleśaṃ tapas tāpasāḥ |
GR14caitcanu:83: jñānābhyāsa-vidhiṃ jahuś ca yatayaś caitanya-candre parām āviṣkurvati bhakti-yoga-padavīṃ naivānya āsīd rasaḥ ||23|| (113)
GR14caitcanu:84: bhrāntaṃ yatra munīśvarair api purā yasmin kṣamā-maṇḍale
GR14caitcanu:85: kasyāpi praviveśa naiva dhiṣaṇā yad veda no vā śukaḥ |
GR14caitcanu:86: yatra kvāpi kṛpāmayena ca nije'py udghāṭitaṃ śauriṇā tasminn ujjvala-bhakti-vartmani sukhaṃ khelanti gaura-priyāḥ ||24|| (18)
GR14caitcanu:88: dāsā bhavantu ca vidhāya harer upāsāḥ |
GR14caitcanu:89: kiñcid rahasya-pada-lobhita-dhīr ahaṃ tu caitanya-candra-caraṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ karomi ||25||
GR14caitcanu:93: yad vā bhāvaya tasya divya-madhuraṃ rūpaṃ jagan-mohanam |
GR14caitcanu:95: śrī-caitanya-mahāprabhor yadi kṛpā-dṛṣṭiḥ paten na tvayi ||27|| (82)
GR14caitcanu:96: bhūto vā bhavitāpi vā bhavati vā kasyāpi yaḥ ko'pi vā sambandho bhagavat-padāmbuja-rase nāsmin jagan-maṇḍale |
GR14caitcanu:97: tat sarvaṃ nija-bhakti-rūpa-paramaiśvaryeṇa vikrīḍato gaurasyaiva kṛpā-vijṛmbhitatayā jānanti nirmatsarāḥ ||28|| (28)
GR14caitcanu:100: vāraṃ vāraṃ vraja-pati-guṇān gāya gāyeti jalpan
GR14caitcanu:101: gauro dṛṣṭaḥ sakṛd api na yair durghaṭā teṣu bhaktiḥ ||29|| (38)
GR14caitcanu:108: śrī-bhaktiḥ kvacid ujjvalāpi ca harer vāṅ-mātra eva sthitā hā caitanya kuto gato'si padavī kutrāpi te nekṣyate ||31|| (138)
GR14caitcanu:109: vinā bījaṃ kiṃ nāṅkura-jananam andho'pi na kathaṃ prapaśyen no paṅgur giri-śikharam ārohati katham |
GR14caitcanu:111: py abhaktānāṃ bhāvī katham api para-prema-rabhasaḥ ||32|| (39)
GR14caitcanu:112: akasmād evaitad bhuvanam abhitaḥ plāvitam abhūn
GR14caitcanu:114: akasmāc cādṛṣṭa-śruta-cara-vikārair alam abhūc camatkāraḥ kṛṣṇe kanaka-rucirāṅge'vatarati are mūḍhā gūḍhāṃ vicinuta harer bhakti-padavīṃ
GR14caitcanu:116: na viśrambhaś citte yadi yadi ca daurlabhyam iva tat parityajyāśeṣaṃ vrajata śaraṇaṃ gaura-caraṇam tāvad brahma-kathā vimukta-padavī tāvan na tiktī-bhavet
GR14caitcanu:117: tāvac cāpi viśṛṅkhalatvam ayate no loka-veda-sthitiḥ |
GR14caitcanu:120: sadā raṅge nīlācala-śikhara-śṛṅge vilasato harer eva bhrājan-mukha-kamala-bhṛṅgekṣaṇa-yugam
GR14caitcanu:122: anaṅgaṃ gaurāṅgaṃ smaratu gata-saṅgaṃ mama manaḥ ||36|| (70)
GR14caitcanu:123: kvacit kṛṣṇāveśān naṭati bahubhaṅgīm abhinayan kvacid rādhāviṣṭo hari hari harīty ārta-ruditaḥ
GR14caitcanu:124: kvacid riṅgan bālaḥ kvacid api ca gopāla-carito
GR14caitcanu:126: aye na kuru sāhasaṃ tava hasanti sarvodyamaṃ janāḥ parita unmadā hari-rasāmṛtāsvādinaḥ |
GR14caitcanu:127: idaṃ tu nibhṛtaṃ śṛṇu praṇaya-vastu prastūyate yad eva nigameṣu tat patir ayaṃ hi gauraḥ param udgṛhṇanti samasta-śāstram abhito durvāra-garvāyitā
GR14caitcanu:129: dvitrāṇy eva japanti kecana harer nāmāni vāmāśayāḥ pūrvaṃ samprati gauracandra udite premāpi sādhāraṇaḥ ||39|| (116)
GR14caitcanu:130: pāpīyān api hīna-jātir api duḥśīlo'pi duṣkarmaṇāṃ sīmāpi śvapacādhamo'pi satataṃ durvāsanāḍhyo'pi ca |
GR14caitcanu:132: naṣṭo'py uddhṛta eva yena kṛpayā taṃ gauram eva stumaḥ ||40|| (78)
GR14caitcanu:133: acaitanyam idaṃ viśvaṃ yadi caitanyam īśvaram |
GR14caitcanu:134: na viduḥ sarva-śāstra-jñā hy api bhrāmyanti te janāḥ ||41|| (37)
GR14caitcanu:137: ko bālaḥ kaś ca vṛddhaḥ ka iha jaḍa-matiḥ ko budhaḥ ko varākaḥ sarveṣām aikarasyaṃ kim api hari-pade bhakti-bhājāṃ babhūva ||42|| (117)
GR14caitcanu:138: dattvā yaḥ kam api prasādam atha sambhāṣya smita-śrī-mukhaṃ
GR14caitcanu:139: dūrāt snigdha-dṛśā nirīkṣya ca mahā-premotsavaṃ yacchati |
GR14caitcanu:140: yeṣāṃ hanta kutarka-karkaśa-dhiyāṃ tatrāpi nātyādaraḥ sākṣāt pūrṇa-rasāvatāriṇi harau duṣṭā amī kevalam ||43|| (45)
GR14caitcanu:141: kāśī-vāsān api na gaṇaye kiṃ gayāṃ mārgaye'haṃ
GR14caitcanu:142: muktiḥ śuktībhavati yadi me kaḥ parārtha-prasaṅgaḥ |
GR14caitcanu:143: trāsābhāsaḥ sphurati na mahā-raurave'pi kva bhītiḥ strī-putrādau yadi kṛpayate deva-devaḥ sa gauraḥ ||44|| (99)
GR14caitcanu:147: mūrtiḥ kācana kāñcana-drava-mayī cittāya me rocate ||45|| (129)
GR14caitcanu:148: dṛṣṭvā mādyati nūtanāmbuda-cayaṃ saṃvīkṣya barhaṃ bhaved
GR14caitcanu:149: atyantaṃ vikalo vilokya valitāṃ guñjāvalīṃ vepate |
GR14caitcanu:151: itthaṃ gaura-tanuḥ pracārita-nija-premā hariḥ pātu vaḥ ||46|| (14)
GR14caitcanu:155: gauraṃ vinādya mama ko bhaviteha bandhuḥ ||47|| (51)
GR14caitcanu:156: hā hanta citta-bhuvi me paramoṣarāyāṃ sad-bhakti-kalpa-latikāṅkuritā kathaṃ syāt |
GR14caitcanu:157: hṛdy ekam eva paramāśasatnīyam asti caitanya-nāma kalayan na kadāpi śocyaḥ ||48|| (53)
GR14caitcanu:162: kva tāvad vairāgyaṃ kva ca viṣaya-vārtāsu narake-
GR14caitcanu:164: kva tat tejo vālaukikam atha mahā-bhakti-padavī
GR14caitcanu:165: kva sā vā sambhāvyā yad avakalitaṃ gaura-gatiṣu ||50|| (20)
GR14caitcanu:168: mahā-premāveśāt kim api naṭanām unmada iva prabhur gauro jīyāt prakaṭa-paramāścarya-mahimā sarve nārada-śaṅkarādaya ihāyātāḥ svayaṃ śrīr api prāptā deva-halāyudho'pi milito jātāś ca te vṛṣṇayaḥ |
GR14caitcanu:177: mahāścaryaṃ premotsavam api haḍhād dātari na yan matir gaure sākṣāt para iha sa mūḍho nara-paśuḥ asaṅkhyāḥ śruty-ādau bhagavad-avatārā nigaditāḥ prabhāvaṃ kaḥ sambhāvayatu param īśād itarataḥ
GR14caitcanu:178: kim anyat mat-preṣṭhe kati kati satāṃ nāpy anubhavās tathāpi śrī-gaure hari hari na mūḍhā hari-dhiyaḥ ||55|| (41)
GR14caitcanu:180: mārgo vā prakaṭī-kṛtaḥ kiyad idaṃ sṛṣṭy-ādikaṃ vā kiyat |
GR14caitcanu:182: bhakter vartma-karīṃ parāṃ bhagavataś caitanya-mūrtiṃ stumaḥ ||56|| (7)
GR14caitcanu:183: sākṣān-mokṣādikārthān vividha-vikṛtibhis tucchatāṃ darśantaṃ premānandaṃ prasūte sakala-tanu-bhṛtāṃ yasya līlā-kaṭākṣaḥ |
GR14caitcanu:184: nāsau vedeṣu gūḍho jagati yadi bhaved īśvaro gauracandras tat-prāpto'nīśa-vādaḥ śiva śiva gahane viṣṇu-māye namaste ||57|| (42)
GR14caitcanu:187: vaikuṇṭhādi-padaṃ svayaṃ ca militaṃ no me mano lipsate
GR14caitcanu:188: pādāmbhoja-rasa-cchaṭā yadi manāk gaurasya no rasyate ||58|| (65)
GR14caitcanu:193: ācarya dharmaṃ paricarya viṣṇuṃ vicarya tīrthāni vicārya vedān |
GR14caitcanu:197: rītiṃ na vedmi na ca sad-guravo milanti |
GR14caitcanu:198: hā hanta hanta mama kaḥ śaraṇaṃ nigūḍha-
GR14caitcanu:199: gauro haris tava na karṇa-pathaṃ gato'sti ||61|| (84)
GR14caitcanu:204: vṛthāveśaṃ karmasv apanayata vārtām api manāk na karṇābhyarṇe'pi kvacana nayatādhyātma-saraṇeḥ
GR14caitcanu:207: alaṃ śāstrābhyāsair alam ahaha tīrthāṭanikayā sadā yoṣid-vyāghryās trasata vitathaṃ thūtkuruta re |
GR14caitcanu:216: sarvāṅgaḥ pavanoccalac-cala-dala-prāya-prakampaṃ dadhan mattaḥ prema-rasonmadāpluta-gatir gauro hariḥ śobhate ||66|| (106)
GR14caitcanu:217: kva sā niraṅkuśa-kṛpā kva tad-vaibhavam adbhutam |
GR14caitcanu:218: kva sā vatsalatā śaure yādṛk gaure tavātmani ||67|| (56)
GR14caitcanu:223: mahā-puruṣa-mānināṃ sura-munīśvarāṇāṃ nijaṃ padāmbujam ajānatāṃ kim api garva-nirvāsanam |
GR14caitcanu:226: āstāṃ nāma mahān mahān iti ravaḥ sarva-kṣamā-maṇḍale
GR14caitcanu:227: loke vā prakaṭāstu nāma mahatī siddhiś camatkāriṇī |
GR14caitcanu:229: ceto me bahumanyate nahi nahi śrī-gaura-bhaktiṃ vinā ||70|| (66)
GR14caitcanu:234: devā dundubhi-vādanaṃ vidadhire gandharva-mukhyā jaguḥ siddhāḥ santata-puṣpa-vṛṣṭibhir imāṃ pṛthvīṃ samācchādayan |
GR14caitcanu:243: udañcad-romāñcair api ca paramā yasya suṣamā tam ālambe gauraṃ harim aruṇa-rociṣṇu-vasanam kandarpād api sundaraḥ surasarit-pūrād aho pāvanaḥ śītāṃśor api śītalaḥ sumadhuro mādhvīka-sārād api |
GR14caitcanu:244: dātā kalpa-mahīruhād api mahān snigdho jananyā api premṇā gaura-hariḥ kadā nu hṛdi me dhyātuḥ padaḥ dhāsyati ||75|| (72)
GR14caitcanu:246: dattvā dattvā svayam urudayo modayan viśvam etat |
GR14caitcanu:249: dṛṣṭaḥ spṛṣṭaḥ kīrtitaḥ saṃsmṛto vā dūrasthair apy ānato vādṛto vā |
GR14caitcanu:250: premṇaḥ sāraṃ dātum īśo ya ekaḥ
GR14caitcanu:256: kiṃ tāvad bata durgameṣu viphalaṃ yogādi-mārgeṣv aho bhaktiṃ kṛṣṇa-padāmbuje vidadhataḥ sarvārtham āluṇṭhataḥ |
GR14caitcanu:259: hasanty uccair uccair ahaha kula-vadhvo'pi parito dravībhāvaṃ gacchanty api kuviṣaya-grāva-ghaṭitāḥ
GR14caitcanu:262: prāyaś caitanyam āsīd api sakala-vidāṃ neha pūrvaṃ yad eṣāṃ khaarvā sarvārtha-sāre'py akṛta nahi padaṃ kuṇṭhitā buddhi-vṛttiḥ |
GR14caitcanu:264: keṣāṃ nāsīd idānīṃ jagati karuṇayā gaura-candre'vatīrṇe ||81|| (121)
GR14caitcanu:265: abhivyakto yatra druta-kanaka-gauro harir abhūn mahimnā tasyaiva praṇaya-rasa-magnaṃ jagad abhūt |
GR14caitcanu:267: sa kālaḥ kiṃ bhūyo'py ahaha parivartate madhuraḥ ||82|| (139)
GR14caitcanu:268: saiveyaṃ bhuvi dhanya-gauḍa-nagarī velāpi saivāmbudheḥ so'yaṃ śrī-puruṣottamo madhupates tāny eva nāmāni ca |
GR14caitcanu:269: no kutrāpi nirīkṣyate hari hari premotsavas tādṛśo hā caitanya kṛpā-nidhāna tava kiṃ vikṣe punar vaibhavam ||83|| (140)
GR14caitcanu:270: apārāvāraṃ cedam ṛtamaya-pāthodhim adhikaṃ vimathya prāptaṃ syāt kim api paramaṃ sāram atulam
GR14caitcanu:272: cchaṭā-spṛṣṭānāṃ tad vahati vikaṭām eva kaṭutām ||84|| (23)
GR14caitcanu:276: bhavanti kila sad-guṇā jagati gaura-bhājām amī ||85|| (24)
GR14caitcanu:279: kadā vā tasyālaukika-sad-anumānena mama hṛdy akasmāt śrī-rādhā-pada-nakha-maṇi-jyotir udabhūt aśrūṇāṃ kim api pravāha-nivahaiḥ kṣauṇīṃ puraḥ paṅkilī-
GR14caitcanu:282: gaurībhūya hariḥ svayaṃ vitanute rādhā-padābje ratim ||87|| (135)
GR14caitcanu:286: ceto'kasmān mama nija-pade gāḍham uptaṃ cakāra ||88|| (61)
GR14caitcanu:291: ko'yaṃ paṭṭa-ghaṭī-virājita-kaṭī-deśaḥ kare kaṅkaṇaṃ hāraṃ vakṣasi kuṇḍalaṃ śravaṇayor bibhrat pade nūpurau |
GR14caitcanu:293: pīḍaḥ krīḍati gaura-nāgara-varo nṛtyan nijair nāmabhiḥ ||90|| (132)
GR14caitcanu:300: audāryeṇa ca koṭi-koṭi-guṇitaṃ kalpa-drumaṃ hy alpayan gauro me hṛdi koṭi-koṭi-januṣāṃ bhāgyaiḥ padaṃ dhāsyati ||92|| (74)
GR14caitcanu:301: kṣaṇaṃ hasati roditi kṣaṇam atha kṣaṇaṃ mūrcchati kṣaṇaṃ luṭhati dhāvati kṣaṇam atha kṣaṇaṃ nṛtyati |
GR14caitcanu:304: kṣaṇaṃ kṣīṇaḥ pīnaḥ kṣaṇam ahaha sāśruḥ kṣaṇam atha kṣaṇaṃ smeraḥ śītaḥ kṣaṇam anala-taptaḥ kṣaṇaṃ api |
GR14caitcanu:305: kṣaṇaṃ dhāvan stabdhaḥ kṣaṇam adhika-jalpan kṣaṇam aho kṣaṇaṃ mūko gauraḥ sphuratu mama deho bhagavataḥ ||94|| (76)
GR14caitcanu:308: viśvaṃ pūrṇa-sukhāyate vidhi-mahendrādiś ca kīṭāyate yat-kāruṇya-kaṭākṣa-vaibhavavatāṃ taṃ gauram eva stumaḥ ||95|| (5)
GR14caitcanu:309: pravāhair aśrūṇāṃ nava-jalada-koṭīr iva dṛśor dadhānaṃ premārdhyā parama-pada-koṭi-prahasanam
GR14caitcanu:311: cchaṭābhis taṃ vande harim ahaha sannyāsa-kapaṭam ||96|| (12)
GR14caitcanu:319: ty āśrāntaṃ mama jalpato janir iyaṃ yāyād iti prārthaye ||98|| (67)
GR14caitcanu:323: dhik-kurvanti sca jñāna-karma-viduṣas taṃ gauram eva stumaḥ ||99|| (6)
GR14caitcanu:324: yo mārgo dura-śūnyo ya iha bata balat-kaṇṭako yo'tidurgo
GR14caitcanu:335: mano me vaikuṇṭhād api ca madhure dhāmni ramate ||102|| (62)
GR14caitcanu:340: yat tad vadantu śāstrāṇi yat tad vyākhyāntu tārkikāḥ |
GR14caitcanu:342: pādāghāta-ravair diśo mukharayan netrāmbhasāṃ veṇībhiḥ kṣauṇiṃ paṅkilayann aho viśadayann aṭṭāṭṭahāsair nabhaḥ |
GR14caitcanu:345: dhig astu kulam ujjvalaṃ dhig api vāgmitāṃ dhig yaśo dhig adhyayanam ākṛtiṃ nava-vayaḥ śriyaṃ cāpi dhik |
GR14caitcanu:346: dvijatvam api dhik para:a vimalam āśramādyaṃ ca dhik na cet paricitaḥ kalau prakaṭa-gaura-gopī-patiḥ dhyāyanto giri-kandareṣu bahavo brahmānubhūyāsate yogābhyāsa-parāś ca santi bahavaḥ siddhā mahī-maṇḍale |
GR14caitcanu:347: vidyā-śaurya-dhanādibhiś ca bahavo valganti mithyoddhatāḥ ko vā gaura-kṛpāṃ vinādya jagati premonmado nṛtyatu ||107|| (98)
GR14caitcanu:348: antardhvānta-cayaṃ samasta-jagatām unmūlayantī haṭhāt premānanda-rasāmbudhiṃ niravadhiṃ prodvelayantī balāt |
GR14caitcanu:357: atas taṃ dhyāyantu praṇaya-bharato yāntu śaraṇaṃ tam eva pronmattās tam iha kila gāyantu kṛtinaḥ ||110|| (89)
GR14caitcanu:362: pātrāpātra-vicāraṇaṃ na kurute na svaṃ paraṃ vīkṣate
GR14caitcanu:363: deyādeya-vimarśako na hi na vā kāla-pratīkṣaḥ prabhuḥ |
GR14caitcanu:364: sadyo yaḥ śravaṇekṣaṇa-praṇamana-dhyānādinā durlabhaṃ datte bhakti-rasaṃ sa eva bhagavān gauraḥ paraṃ me gatiḥ ||112|| (77)
GR14caitcanu:365: kecid dāsyam avāpur uddhava-mukhāḥ ślāghyaṃ pare lebhire
GR14caitcanu:369: sarvajñair muni-puṅgavaiḥ pravitate tat-tan-mate yuktibhiḥ pūrvaṃ naikataratra ko'pi sudṛḍhaṃ viśvasta āsīj janaḥ |
GR14caitcanu:371: śruty-artho hari-bhaktir eva paramaḥ kair vā na nirdhāryate ||114|| (124)
GR14caitcanu:373: viśvaṃ gaura-rase magnaṃ sparśo'pi mama nābhavat ||115|| (46)
GR14caitcanu:377: kṛtāṅgās taṃ gauraṃ katham akṛta-puṇyaḥ praṇayatu ||116|| (44)
GR14caitcanu:378: kair vā sarva-pumartha-maulir akṛtāyāsair ihāsād ito
GR14caitcanu:380: hā hā dhig mama jīvitaṃ dhig api me vidyāṃ dhig apy āśramaṃ yad daurbhāgya-bharād aho mama na tad-sambandho-gandho'py abhūt ||117||
GR14caitcanu:387: dante nidhāya tṛṇakaṃ padayor nipatya kṛtvā ca kāku-śatam etad ahaṃ bravīmi |
GR14caitcanu:388: he sādhavaḥ sakalam eva vihāya dūrād
GR14caitcanu:390: patanti yadi siddhayaḥ karatale svayaṃ durlabhāḥ svayaṃ ca yadi sevakī-bhavitum āgatāḥ syuḥ surāḥ |
GR14caitcanu:391: kim anyad idam eva me yadi caturbhujaṃ syād vapus tathāpi na mano manāk calati gauracandrān mama ||121|| (64)
GR14caitcanu:392: aho na durlabhā muktir na ca bhaktiḥ sudurlabhā |
GR14caitcanu:394: so'py āścarya-mayaḥ prabhur nayanayor yan nābhavad gocaro yan nāsvādi hareḥ padāmbuja-rasas tad yad gataṃ tad gatam |
GR14caitcanu:395: etāvan mama tāvad astu jagatīṃ ye'dyāpy alaṅkurvate
GR14caitcanu:403: hā hā kva yāmi vikalaḥ kim ahaṃ karomi caitanya-candra yadi nādya kṛpāṃ karoṣi ||125||
GR14caitcanu:409: tattvānudhyāna-koṭir bhavatu bhavatu vā vaiṣṇavī bhakti-koṭiḥ |
GR14caitcanu:410: koṭy-aṃśo 'py asya na syāt tad api guṇa-gaṇo yaḥ svataḥ-siddha āste
GR14caitcanu:425: gaurāṅge nyasta-bhāvo yaḥ sarvārtha-pūrṇa eva saḥ ||131|| (30)
GR14caitcanu:428: dṛṣṭaṃ na śāstraṃ guravo na pṛṣṭā vivecitaṃ nāpi budhaiḥ sva-buddhyā |
GR14caitcanu:431: kecit sāgara-bhūdharān api parākrāmanti nṛtyanti vai kecid deva-purandarādiṣ mahā-kṣepaṃ kṣipante muhuḥ |
GR14caitcanu:433: ke kiṃ no kṛtavanta īdṛśi punaś caitanya-nṛtyotsave ||134|| (27)
GR14caitcanu:435: ye na majjanti majjanti te mahānartha-sāgare ||135|| (35)
GR14caitcanu:437: caitanya-candre prakaṭe yo dīno dīna eva saḥ ||136|| (36)
GR14caitcanu:440: muktibhyo mahatīṃ pumān na labhate tat-koṣa-bhūṣāṅkarīṃ
GR14caitcanu:443: tasyendro dāsavad bhāti kā kathā nṛpa-kīṭake ||138|| (96)
GR14caitcanu:445: cintāmaṇi-cayaṃ prāpya ko gūḍho rajataṃ vrajet ||139|| (97)
GR14caitcanu:451: evaṃ kair api na kṛtaṃ yat premābdhau nimajjitaṃ viśvam ||141|| (126)
GR14caitcanu:452: yadi nigadita-mīnādy-aṃśavad gauracandro na tad api sa hi kaścic chakti-līlā-vikāśaḥ |
GR14caitcanu:459: acaitanyam idaṃ viśvaṃ yadi caitanyam īśvaram |
